name: Cambion
description: The Cambion is a medium-sized fiend that exhibits exceptional physical prowess with high Strength, Dexterity, and Charisma. Notably, it wields a Black Iron Blade and possesses the ability to shapeshift into humanoid forms.
memorable: The Cambion is unique due to its ability to charm others, command allies, and create fiery portals, making it a formidable opponent both in and out of direct combat.
goals: The Cambion typically seeks to spread chaos, manipulate those around it, and serve its fiendish parent.
relations: Cambions often have ties to fiendish beings and can lead or influence lesser fiends or mortals.
environment: Cambions can often be found in dark, secluded places or in the service of powerful fiends, roaming the astral or shadowy realms.
strengths: The Cambion has resistance to cold, fire, poison, and damage from nonmagical weapons, allowing it to withstand diverse attacks.
weaknesses: Its reliance on fiendish magic may be vulnerable to characters with strong counter-magic abilities.
attacks: The Cambion can attack with its Black Iron Blade, dealing slashing damage and inflicting ongoing wound effects, or from a distance with its Fire Blast, dealing fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Escape allows the Cambion to create a portal to its fiendish parent's realm, damaging anyone else that enters its space.
senses: The Cambion has a passive Perception score of 15, indicating a keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: The Cambion excels in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and has a good perception of its environment.
additional_information: Can charm others for a day with Fell Charm.
Can command allies to react tactically in battle.
Shapeshifting ability allows it to mimic humanoids.
Multiattack grants two attacks per turn.
Inflicts ongoing damage with its melee attacks.
spellcasting: The Cambion can cast Fire Blast as a ranged attack, dealing fire damage from a distance.
test_queries: medium fiend with black iron blade
monster that resists fire and poison
